{"id":1485100785,"question_id":3686,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1734838965,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1485100785/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Beautiful Splits in an Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    pair<long long, long long> compute_hash(string const& s, long long hash_value, long long p_pow) {\n        const int p = 31;\n        const int m = 1e9 + 7;\n        for (char c : s) {\n            hash_value = (hash_value + (c - '0' + 1) * p_pow) % m;\n            p_pow = (p_pow * p) % m;\n        }\n        return {hash_value, p_pow};\n    }\n\n    int beautifulSplits(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        vector<vector<long long>> hash(N, vector<long long> (N, -1));\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            long long hash_value = 0;\n            long long p_pow = 1;\n            for (int j=i; j<N; j++) {\n                auto ret = compute_hash(to_string(nums[j]) + \"=\", hash_value, p_pow);\n                hash_value = ret.first;\n                p_pow = ret.second;\n                hash[i][j] = hash_value;\n            }\n        }\n\n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int i=1; i<N-1; i++) {\n            for (int j=i+1; j<N; j++) {\n                bool ok = false;\n                if (j-i >= i && hash[0][i-1] == hash[i][2*i-1])\n                    ok |= true;\n                if (N-j >= j-i && hash[i][j-1] == hash[j][i+2*(j-i)-1])\n                    ok |= true;\n                ans += ok;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-beautiful-splits-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":978}
